author: ShadyTidus
description: Community Wiki Helper with slash command support: LFG system with game detection, hosting guidelines, info commands, rule explanations, and moderation tools. Easy JSON configuration. From ShadyCogs collection.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Wiki Cog from ShadyCogs! Configure using JSON files in wiki/config/ (see wiki/config/examples/ for templates). Use slash commands: `/lfg`, `/host`, `/biweekly`, `/rule`, `/wow`, `/fafo`, `/hosted`. Reload configs with `[p]wikireload`.
name: wiki
short: Wiki helper with JSON configs and LFG system.
